unnormalised: Arre bhai, aizkaal cybersecurity kitli mhotvachi asa! Mhojea ixttan ₹50000 online dolleant dhul jhunkani ghalun ghetole pattlea satolleant; tannem eka "company"chea shankaaspad linkacher click kelem, tem iPhonesacher 90% discount ditam mhunn sangtaalem.
normalised: Arre bhai, cybersecurity azakal kitli mhotvachi asa! Mhozo ixtt pattlea satolleant online ghotalleant rupiya pon'nas hazar harpolo; tannem iPhone-ancher novvaddekke sudd diunk davo korpi eka "company" kadlean aillya kitleak-uy san'dehavash link-cher click kelem.
text: Arre bhai, aizkaal cybersecurity kitli mhotvachi asa! Mhojea ixttan ₹50000 online dolleant dhul jhunkani ghalun ghetole pattlea satolleant; tannem eka "company"chea shankaaspad linkacher click kelem, tem iPhonesacher 90% discount ditam mhunn sangtaalem.
